alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Crawford; Erie; Huron; Lorain; Medina; Richland; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 8:57PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Richland, Huron, eastern Seneca, Erie, southwestern Medina, northern Ashland, northeastern Crawford and southwestern Lorain Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 856 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from West Salem to Bellevue. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Norwalk, Shelby, Bellevue, Willard, Wellington, Lodi, New London, Plymouth, Green Springs, Northern Milan, Milan, Wakeman, New Washington, Bloomville, Hayesville, Savannah, Chatfield and Sullivan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Warning remains in effect until 930 PM EDT for portions of Ashland County. Those under the Tornado Warning should seek shelter in an interior room away from windows. See that bulletin for more information. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Crawford; Erie; Huron; Lorain; Medina; Richland; Seneca
